    • Method Detail

      • toSpaces

        public static java.lang.String toSpaces(java.lang.String str,
                                        java.lang.String tab,
                                        java.lang.String eol)
        Normalizes a string's white space characters to a number of space characters. The following characters are normalized as follows:
        \t, horizontal tabsee tab string
        vertical tabsingle space character
        \n \f \r, new line, line feed, carriage return see eol string
         ,  ,  , ﻿ no break space, figure space, narrow no break space, zero width no break space single space character
        Character.isWhitespace = trueany other Java whitespace character single space character
        Unlike Java white space characters, no break (non breaking, nbsp,  ) white space characters are normalized as space characters.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to normalize
        tab - swaps out the tab character \t to the given string. Set to null to not swap it.
        eol - swaps out end of line characters (\n, \r) to the given string. Set to null to not swap it.
        Returns:
        normalized white space string
        See Also:
        Character.isWhitespace(char)

      • toSpaces

        public static java.lang.String toSpaces(java.lang.String str)
        Normalizes a string's white space characters to a number of space characters. Tabs are swapped with 8 space characters. End of line characters are deleted.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to normalize
        Returns:
        normalized white space string
        See Also:
        toSpaces(String, String, String)
